meanings.definition: Unconventional or bizarre in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her outre fashion sense always turned heads.
meanings.sent2: The artist's outre paintings were unlike anything seen before.
meanings.sent3: The outre hat she wore to the party was a real conversation starter.
meanings.sent4: His outre ideas pushed the boundaries of traditional thinking.
meanings.sent5: The outre design of the building made it a landmark in the city.

meanings.definition: Going beyond what is usual or conventional.
meanings.sent1: The outre proposal surprised everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: Their outre approach to problem-solving yielded impressive results.
meanings.sent3: It was outre for him to suggest skydiving as a team-building activity.
meanings.sent4: Her outre decision to quit her job and travel the world inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The outre concept of time travel fascinated the young students.
